description:
When Haruhiko sends Misaki flowers, Akihiko starts getting jealous because Misaki refuses to say he loves him. Then, when Isaki pressures Misaki to stay away from Akihiko in order to protect his public image, Misaki himself starts to question their relati
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nido Aru Koto wa Sando Aru
What Happens Twice Will Happen Thrice
二度あることは三度ある
